create.success: The match ({{ homeTeam }} vs {{ awayTeam }}) has been successfully created.

delete.same-teams: The home and away teams have to be different. One team can't play against itself.
delete.success: Successfully deleted {{ count }} match(es) between {{ homeTeam }} and {{ awayTeam }} in the season {{ season }}.
